espresso.title: Espresso
espresso.proTip: Use fresh coffee and filtered water

americano.title: Americano
americano.proTip: Serve in large cup for customers who prefer mild coffee

cappuccino.title: Cappuccino
cappuccino.proTip: Use whole milk for creamy foam

flat-white.title: Flat White
flat-white.proTip: Ideal for intense flavor and silky texture

mocha.title: Mocha
mocha.preparation: Mix espresso with chocolate → add milk → decorate with cream

cold-brew.title: Cold Brew
cold-brew.proTip: Serve with ice and vanilla syrup

iced-latte.title: Iced Latte
iced-latte.proTip: Use thick milk (e.g. whole or oat)

affogato.title: Affogato
affogato.proportions: 1 shot espresso (30ml) + 1 scoop of ice cream

long-black.title: Long Black
long-black.preparation: Pour hot water first, then add espresso
long-black.proTip: The difference with Americano is that espresso is poured over water, preserving the crema

irish-coffee.title: Irish Coffee
irish-coffee.proportions: 1 cup coffee (240ml) + 30ml whiskey + 1 teaspoon sugar + whipped cream
irish-coffee.preparation: Mix coffee, whiskey and sugar. Cover with whipped cream
irish-coffee.proTip: Ideal for special occasions or cold weather

espresso-romano.title: Espresso Romano
espresso-romano.preparation: Prepare espresso and squeeze a lemon peel over the cup
espresso-romano.proTip: The lemon enhances the citrus flavors of the coffee

nitro-cold-brew.title: Nitro Cold Brew
nitro-cold-brew.preparation: Prepare cold brew, filter and serve with nitrogen using a special tower
nitro-cold-brew.proTip: The nitrogen infusion creates a smooth foam similar to beer

dirty-chai-latte.title: Dirty Chai Latte
dirty-chai-latte.preparation: Prepare chai tea with milk, add a shot of espresso
dirty-chai-latte.proTip: Combines chai spices with the robust flavor of coffee

espresso-tonic.title: Espresso Tonic
espresso-tonic.preparation: Serve tonic water with ice, then slowly pour espresso
espresso-tonic.proTip: Refreshing and perfect for hot days

cafe-irlandes.title: Irish Coffee
cafe-irlandes.ingredients: Filter coffee + Irish whiskey + Brown sugar + Whipped cream
cafe-irlandes.proportions: 180ml filter coffee + 45ml whiskey + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 30ml whipped cream
cafe-irlandes.preparation: Heat the cup with hot water → empty → add sugar and coffee → add whiskey → float whipped cream on top (without mixing)
cafe-irlandes.proTip: Drink through the cream to experience the mix of temperatures and flavors

caramel-macchiato.title: Caramel Macchiato
caramel-macchiato.ingredients: Espresso + Steamed milk + Vanilla syrup + Caramel
caramel-macchiato.proportions: 60ml espresso + 180ml milk + 15ml vanilla syrup + 10ml caramel sauce
caramel-macchiato.preparation: Vanilla syrup at the bottom → steamed milk → espresso → decorate with caramel in a grid pattern
caramel-macchiato.proTip: Serve in a transparent glass to see the layers

cafe-breve.title: Breve
cafe-breve.ingredients: Espresso + Half & half (half cream, half milk)
cafe-breve.proportions: 30ml espresso + 120ml of 50/50 cream and milk mix
cafe-breve.preparation: Steam the cream and milk mix → espresso → add steamed mix
cafe-breve.proTip: Richer and creamier than a traditional latte, perfect for palates that prefer more intense flavors

submarino.title: Submarino
submarino.preparation: Heat milk without boiling → serve in tall cup → place chocolate bar vertically as a "submarine"
submarino.proTip: Let the diner submerge and melt the chocolate to their taste

jamaicano.title: Jamaican Coffee
jamaicano.ingredients: Espresso + Aged rum + Whipped cream + Cinnamon + Chocolate
jamaicano.proportions: 30ml espresso + 20ml rum + 30ml whipped cream + pinch of cinnamon + chocolate shavings
jamaicano.preparation: Mix espresso with rum → add whipped cream on top → sprinkle cinnamon and chocolate shavings
jamaicano.proTip: Serve with a cinnamon stick as decoration and to stir

cremaet.title: Cremaet
cremaet.ingredients: Espresso + Brandy + Sugar + Cinnamon + Lemon peel + Coffee beans
cremaet.proportions: 30ml espresso + 20ml brandy + 1 tablespoon sugar + 1 cinnamon stick + peel from 1/4 lemon + 3 coffee beans
cremaet.preparation: Heat brandy with sugar, cinnamon, lemon peel and beans → flambé until caramelized → add hot espresso
cremaet.proTip: Traditional from Valencia, serve with a small spoon to enjoy the caramelized sugar

cafe-escoces.title: Scottish Coffee
cafe-escoces.ingredients: Espresso coffee + Scotch whisky + Whipped cream + Cocoa powder
cafe-escoces.proportions: 30ml espresso + 30ml Scotch whisky + 30ml whipped cream + pinch of cocoa powder
cafe-escoces.preparation: Mix espresso with whisky → top with whipped cream → sprinkle cocoa powder
cafe-escoces.proTip: Use a smoky whisky to enhance the coffee notes

iced-coffee-latte.title: Iced Coffee Latte
iced-coffee-latte.ingredients: Espresso coffee + Cold milk + Ice + Syrup (optional)
iced-coffee-latte.proportions: 60ml espresso + 120ml cold milk + plenty of ice + 15ml syrup (optional)
iced-coffee-latte.preparation: Prepare espresso and let cool → fill a glass with ice → add cold milk → pour espresso → add syrup to taste
iced-coffee-latte.proTip: For a more intense flavor, freeze coffee into cubes and use instead of regular ice

cafe-goloso.title: Sweet Coffee
cafe-goloso.ingredients: Espresso coffee + Condensed milk + Whipped cream + Grated chocolate
cafe-goloso.proportions: 30ml espresso + 30ml condensed milk + 30ml whipped cream + grated chocolate for decoration
cafe-goloso.preparation: Pour condensed milk at the bottom of the cup → add espresso → top with whipped cream → decorate with grated chocolate
cafe-goloso.proTip: Serve with a cookie to accompany and balance the sweetness

batido-cafe.title: Coffee Milkshake
batido-cafe.ingredients: Cold espresso coffee + Vanilla ice cream + Cold milk + Whipped cream
batido-cafe.proportions: 60ml cold espresso + 2 scoops vanilla ice cream + 120ml cold milk + whipped cream for decoration
batido-cafe.preparation: Prepare espresso and let cool → mix in a blender with ice cream and milk → serve in tall glass → decorate with whipped cream
batido-cafe.proTip: Add a teaspoon of cocoa powder to the mix for an extra touch of flavor

cafe-aperitivo.title: Aperitif Coffee
cafe-aperitivo.ingredients: Espresso coffee + Red vermouth + Orange twist + Ice
cafe-aperitivo.proportions: 30ml espresso + 60ml red vermouth + orange peel + ice
cafe-aperitivo.preparation: Prepare espresso and let cool → add ice to a low glass → pour vermouth → add cold espresso → aromatize with orange peel
cafe-aperitivo.proTip: Serve with a green olive for an interesting salty-bitter contrast
